name: starter-proj
description: Build System to compile Sass & JS

scripts.uglify: mkdir -p public/js && uglifyjs src/js/*.js -m -o public/js/app.js && uglifyjs src/js/*.js -m -c -o public/js/app.min.js
scripts.icons: svgo -f src/images/icons && mkdir -p public/images && svg-sprite-generate -d src/images/icons -o public/images/icons.svg
scripts.build:css: npm run scss && npm run autoprefixer
scripts.build:js: npm run lint && npm run uglify
scripts.build:images: npm run imagemin && npm run icons
scripts.build:all: npm run build:css && npm run build:js && npm run build:images
scripts.postinstall: npm run build:all && npm run watch:all
